Pre-Game Insights: The weather in Lauderhill could severely impact the contest between Canada and India.
India could test out their bench strength with players like Kuldeep Yadav or Sanju Samson.
Virat Kohli's last chance to find form before the Super Eight stage.
Canada have been knocked out of the tournament but hope to sign off at their best against India.
Aaron Johnson is Canada's second highest run-scorer and is coming into this game on the back of a confident 52 against Pakistan.
Hardik Pandya is India's joint highest wicket-taker so far in the competition with seven wickets in three games.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was abandoned without a ball bowled due to rain.
Canada have never faced India in a T20I.
Rohit Sharma is the top-scorer in T20Is at Lauderhill with 196 runs.
Arshdeep Singh has the second most T20I wickets in Lauderhill with seven in four innings.
